description:
Fate Testarossa is a skilled and powerful mage. Just like Nanoha she`s 9 years old and is also tasked with collecting the twelve Jewel Seeds. But unlike Nanoha she`s far more experienced and has a familiar named Arf.
Fate is a clone created by Precia Testarossa in order to replace her own dead daughter Alicia Testarossa.
Fate in A`s:
She`s now a temporary mage of Time-Space Administration Bureau and her first mission takes Fate to Earth where she must act as a normal girl and Nanoha`s classmate.
name: Fate Testarossa
